Sentencas: The combination of solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) and biomass gasification is a potentially attractive technology for the production of clean and renewable energy.
Titulo: Impact of Steam on the Interaction between Biomass Gasification Tars and Nickel-Based Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Anode Materials

Sentencas: However the impact of tars, formed during biomass gasification, on the performance and durability of SOFC anodes has not been well established experimentally.
Titulo: Impact of Steam on the Interaction between Biomass Gasification Tars and Nickel-Based Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Anode Materials

Sentencas: This paper reports on the comparison between thermodynamic predictions and experimental measurements of carbon formation arising from the steam reforming of 15 g/Nm(3) benzene as a model biomass gasification tar over two commercially available nickel-based SOFC anode materials, Ni/YSZ (yttria-stabilized zirconia) and Ni/CGO (gadolinium-doped ceria).
Titulo: Impact of Steam on the Interaction between Biomass Gasification Tars and Nickel-Based Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Anode Materials

Sentencas: Parallel experiments were performed using 60:40 wt% NiO/YSZ and 50:50 wt% NiO/CGO powders as catalyst material, and the degree of carbon formation was examined by temperature-programmed oxidation.
Titulo: Impact of Steam on the Interaction between Biomass Gasification Tars and Nickel-Based Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Anode Materials

Sentencas: The addition of steam reduced carbon formation on both materials, with Ni/CGO showing slightly more carbon formation compared to Ni/YSZ.
Titulo: Impact of Steam on the Interaction between Biomass Gasification Tars and Nickel-Based Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Anode Materials

Sentencas: This could reflect the differing nickel content in both materials, the activity of the anode material toward tar reforming, and/or the difference in surface area of each material.
Titulo: Impact of Steam on the Interaction between Biomass Gasification Tars and Nickel-Based Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Anode Materials

Sentencas: Carbon formation was excessive for both materials at steam to carbon ratios below 1.
Titulo: Impact of Steam on the Interaction between Biomass Gasification Tars and Nickel-Based Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Anode Materials

Sentencas: However, carbon formation was also present above the thermodynamically stable region for carbon formation with both materials.
Titulo: Impact of Steam on the Interaction between Biomass Gasification Tars and Nickel-Based Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Anode Materials

Sentencas: Tar conversion, and thus CO concentration, was higher for the Ni/YSZ material, whereas the oxidative behavior of ceria in the Ni/CGO anode material resulted in higher CO2 concentrations.
Titulo: Impact of Steam on the Interaction between Biomass Gasification Tars and Nickel-Based Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Anode Materials
